This is a large-scale contemporary science fiction harem 3000 love development visual interactive novel.
If you need an English subtitle version, please download the DLC"OKEverything with 3000 beauties PART01". After playing the game, you can contact customer service email for free update methods
When you enter the story world of Okeverything, you will play the role of a righteous, talented, lecherous, unlucky, and bloodthirsty 25-year-old virgin.
I have been boasting to my classmates since I started college at the age of 18 that I will definitely find a girlfriend to have my first sexual encounter this year, but I have failed every year. Although I have good abilities, I often miss opportunities due to poor luck, and I often get injured accidentally when going out. I can't even pass the driver's license exam.

However, in an accident, you receive a magical button of love bestowed upon you by God. When you press the button on anyone, they will agree to whatever you say, and even allow them to break through human potential and achieve things that ordinary people cannot.
But if the use of buttons has consequences that are not conducive to sustainable social development, the buttons will be recycled and you will lose everything you have gained from them.

During the development of the story,
May engage in love interactions with beautiful women of different skin colors, ages (18-60 years old), professions, personalities, and identities in various incredible scenes such as sea, land, and air,
